messages.message: I should be able to work on AUTO-290 today

• `sign-up.spec.ts`: i'll look into more: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C052YKRTJP5/p1751331264302619
• `group-saml-mappings.spec.ts` & `groups.spec.ts` : i've been debugging/monitoring this for a while now :sweat: . This is related to CPS getting OOM-killed. I'll look into this more with Matt today. After last evening's deployment, the group pages in aihub-sandbox and crafting-cyp are working as expected now (and the page load was fast). I don't know why it gets OOM-killed to start, and why it's working now
`group-saml-mappings.spec.ts` started failing again... let's skip this for now. Matt and I are still debugging this OOM-kill/slow request issue
